product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Cold Black Bean Salad - 2 Servings
long_description: Add a new item to your camping menu with the Backpacker's Pantry Cold Black Bean salad. To prepare, first remove the olive oil packet and set aside; add 1.25 cups of cold water to the pouch, stir well and then let sit for 40 min.; add oil, stir and serve. Includes black beans, sweet corn, tomatoes and cilantro in a zesty sauce. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Add a new item to your camping menu with the Backpacker's Pantry Cold Black Bean salad.
